title: This stupid vayne buff
body: What's with this bullshit. I cant see her anymore, what's the counterplay

replies.body:
the ultimate counterplay riot has been pushing us into for all fotm champions

#ban them

> [{quoted}](name=FOR JUSTICE,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-01-09T16:54:15.172+0000)
>
> the ultimate counterplay riot has been pushing us into for all fotm champions
>

Riot felt liberated with champion design when they gave everyone a ban.

then can Jax get real armor magic resist and HP stats so that he can possibly use his intended hybrid build of {{item:3146}} {{item:3124}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3115}} {{item:1001}} {{item:3143}} . 
Instead of {{item:3748}} and people crying cause he does a pitiful amount of max hp damage but has a good amount of attack speed.

the counterplay is the same as any other champion in season 9

Kill her before she kills you
Yeah, but you can't see her and then it becomes way harder to kill her.

Not possible when she presses R and is invisible except for brief 0.25s windows.

Riot should have doubled all of vayne's CDs to compensate for this buff.
It’s a team game, just have someone play Malphite or Mumu and just ult on top of her.

> [{quoted}](name=Errastas,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=000300010000,timestamp=2019-01-10T15:21:06.701+0000)
>
>** It’s a team game**, just have someone play Malphite or Mumu and just ult on top of her.

With nobody who wants to play as a team I may add.
That requires you bring a Malphite or Amumu. And if either whiffs their R because, guess what, you can't see Vayne, they will get spammed with ? pings after Vayne deletes them on 2.5 items.
hit her with your q and she's dead.

> [{quoted}](name=I lit your baby,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2019-01-09T18:52:20.616+0000)
>
> hit her with your q and he's dead.

Can't hit what you can't see/reach (can't use targeted abilities when she's invisible, and can't hit, let alone out damage her with skill shots when she's so mobile plus invisible. Truly a crapshoot champ.

> [{quoted}](name=kingDeDeDarius,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2019-01-09T22:12:36.298+0000)
>
> Can't hit what you can't see/reach (can't use targeted abilities when she's invisible, and can't hit, let alone out damage her with skill shots when she's so mobile plus invisible. Truly a crapshoot champ.

Well, if you're iron, like most part of boards - that makes sense.

But we all know that's not true and almost nothing changed due to patch.

Because Vayne wasn't already an annoying champ, with her no-counter %max HP + base true damage every 3rd AA, self-peel E that, in case it stunned you, may become your own death, untargetable R + Q that made her a pain to kill with anything that is not an AoE damage skillshot, and never forget about that passive that gives her MS speed in many circumstances, and also gets doubled when you use your ult (just in case you thought you could just run behind cover).

Noooooo... What she needed is extra untargetable time so she can destroy ADCs in lane phase (as they won't be able to AA you) and be even more annoying to kill for any other champ in the game...

Now for real, stop using "hurr durr, u're iron xd" comments and be honest: Vayne will have no counterplay until some changes are made. Against a decent Vayne, you've always had to play really safe and bully her as much as possible, because if she ever got some items; that's it, the game was over. Now... What are you gonna do? She has half CD time for one of her defense mechanisms for no reason.

>

Against a decent Vayne, you've always had to play really safe and bully her as much as possible, because if she ever got some items; that's it, the game was over. Now... What are you gonna do? She has half CD time for one of her defense mechanisms for no reason.

Why would i stop it if this buff makins close to 0 sense?Her q already has 2 sec cd w/o any cdr. Yes, this allows her to dodge shit more reliant sometimes, but that's it. She still will be useless against long range line ups. She's still easy to focus, and her q still slows her dps input.

Ppl even in plat are borderline brain disabled, it's pretty hard to imagine what happens in iron or bronze, but i bet, those kind of 'human' beings are not allowed to talk about balance changes, especially, when it comes to one of 3 adc's, that actually requires skill to play

But reality is different when it comes to someone, knows how the game works.

that's wrong.
It differ between wording ofc, so if some iron gameplay god saying that they're frustrated by vayne, lucian - they're obviosly not lying.
 But this doesnt mean that vayne or lucian overbuffed or broken. They're just pointing that on their elo they're not good enough to play against those heroes. But most of the time it comes with s-tier conclusion that this is not because they're bad, but because hero is broken.

Vayne is broken, and is anti-fun to play against. Here diamond player said it. Now can we back to the original topic thank you.

This is season 9.

You one shot her or die.

When I play Vayne half the time I look at the death bar thing and it says some shit like 2500 damage in 0.3 seconds.

"What's the counterplay?" is exactly my same thought.

But tbh it's the state of the game now, one shot her or die. Most people play carry champs with low CC anyway and that's why they usually don't lock her down resulting in threads like this.

Take advantage of your damage and nuke her.

Yes. I'm a tanky bruiser toplaner with gapclosers, I'm gonna--- WHOOPS!

It seems like Vayne used her E. Now I'm stunned and I'm dead or wasted my time.

Okay, next time I will delete her as soon as I-- WHOOPS! She turned invisible. I think I can kill her, as I'm a tanky brui...

***Gets 40% of his HP dealt as true damage, around 2000hp***

yeah but how the fuck do we nuke her if we cant even see her
Ban until they nerf her. Thats the cycle of riots balancing.

Just by the way here, but the CD on her Q only starts after she uses that auto, like other AA enhancers. At that point, she'll be visible for 1.5 seconds at level 6, and 1 second at level 9 and up (she doesn't usually get much CDR, if any). I mean, I didn't know Vayne needed a buff, and I don't think more invisibility is a good thing for a PvP game, but that's all the advice I've got for now.
But some cheeky Vayne players are starting to build {{item:3508}} as a second or third item, and that means she'll literally have tumble ready the moment her first attack connects with an enemy.

> [{quoted}](name=kargish,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2019-01-10T11:49:01.745+0000)
>
> But some cheeky Vayne players are starting to build {{item:3508}} as a second or third item, and that means she'll literally have tumble ready the moment her first attack connects with an enemy.

The CD only _starts_ the moment her first attack connects with an enemy, and ER refunds 20% (not 100%) of the remaining CD, so it is mathematically impossible for it to be up again at that point (zero CD), regardless of what [lying clickbait videos](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EveF2F9FKMY) will tell you.

And the ER refund is also received when the attack connects. So we got a 1.6s CD tumble that gets 20% refund, and a 50% refund based on its CD at the time the attack connects (1.6s), so yes it is practically up when the attack connects.

> [{quoted}](name=kargish,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=0007000100000000,timestamp=2019-01-10T12:33:29.181+0000)
>
> And the ER refund is also received when the attack connects. So we got a 1.6s CD tumble that gets 20% refund, and a 50% refund based on its CD at the time the attack connects (1.6s), so yes it is practically up when the attack connects.

It doesn't work like that. From the [patch notes](https://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-91-notes):

> Tumble's cooldown is reduced by 50% while Final Hour is active _(reminder: Tumble's cooldown doesn't start until Vayne fires the empowered attack)_

So, if Vayne for some reason has 40% CDR (which she won't unless she's itemizing for cheese hilarity rather than DPS), a max-rank Tumble would have a 1.2-second CD. When she hits Final Hour, it goes down to 0.6 seconds. When she Tumbles, the ability's CD does not immediately start, nor does it start when she fires an auto. It starts when the projectile hits a target. ER refunds 20% of the _remaining_ CD (not that that distinction matters when the ability's CD only started when the auto hit, anyway), in this case refunding 20% of 0.6 seconds, which is 0.12 seconds, for a remaining CD of 0.48 seconds. If her only CDR is from ER, Tumble's CD would be 1.6 seconds, or 0.8 during Final Hour, which would be reduced to 0.64 seconds by ER when the attack hits. If she's not burdening herself with cheese, it'll simply be 1 second.

So no, you are not correct.

> [{quoted}](name=kargish,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=00070001,timestamp=2019-01-10T11:49:01.745+0000)
>
> But some cheeky Vayne players are starting to build {{item:3508}} as a second or third item, and that means she'll literally have tumble ready the moment her first attack connects with an enemy.

Been doing it since it's rework.
It would be ok if it was just invisibility, but the dash being part of it means good luck landing a skillshot on her if she isn't on top of you.
Yeah, but if you take into account the .2 seconds for human reaction time, then you only have .8 seconds to do anything to her before she tumbles again.

> [{quoted}](name=Bob the Toastr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=00070002,timestamp=2019-01-10T15:12:59.454+0000)

hol up.
Ignite gives true vision, right? So ignite her, I guess

not only your name is dumb, that's not true sight, it's brief outline of exactly where they are whenever they take a tick of damage.
not only it isn't as helpful as it sounds because she's constantly moving, but it doesn't allow to target her with autoattacks/point and click spells.

> [{quoted}](name=ThisName1sDumb,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7qtwTVEq,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2019-01-10T02:10:22.653+0000)
>
> Ignite gives true vision, right? So ignite her, I guess

{{summoner:14}} 
ignites an enemy champion, dealing 80 − 505 (based on level) true damage over 5 seconds, with the first tick of damage occurring on-cast and subsequent ticks occurring each 1.2 seconds. This also applies Grievous Wounds icon Grievous Wounds and reveals them for the duration. The Sight **sight will not reveal stealth champions.**
Ah my bad, I wasn't actually sure about that. Thanks for correcting me. I don't play Vayne and I don't use ignite much so my bad

Why can no one play against ADCs, well in this case Vayne ? She is so easy to counter. All you have to do is punish her in laning phase. This buff doesn't make her that much more powerful. Just know what to do in a fight. There are so many champs with CC enough to stop her. You save that cc for her, wait for the moment she briefly stops to fire an AA (she'd want to be firing at least 2 every time she's out of stealth, considering her Rageblade is stacked) and boom, you got her. Since she is not 4k HP heavy bruiser, 1 CC lands and the party is over. I don't see a problem. Just some mental effort. 

Ya'll here are describing her as the ultimate champ right now, but in fact she's just as strong as before, she just has the means to teamfight properly now.

i really hope it will be reworked, so she will have new model , voice, and maybe decent kit with a counterplay window.
it's impossible to see a vayne 0/10 doing 3x while we are about to destroy they inib at 22
Even with twisted fate as your midlaner you still have a hard match up on your hands with the new Vayne
Banned her :')
is this the 5th vayne buff in a year?
